data.name: Programming
data.description: Learn programming from scratch, covering various languages such as Python, JavaScript, and Java. Understand algorithms, data structures, and software development best practices.

data.name: Mathematics
data.description: Master the fundamentals of mathematics including algebra, calculus, and geometry. This course is designed to build a strong foundation for advanced mathematical studies.

data.name: Physics
data.description: Explore the principles of physics, from classical mechanics to modern quantum physics. Learn about the laws that govern the universe and how to apply them in real-world scenarios.

data.name: Chemistry
data.description: Dive into the world of chemistry, understanding chemical reactions, molecular structures, and the periodic table. This course covers both theoretical and practical aspects of chemistry.
data.shortDescription: Dive into the world of chemistry.

data.name: Biology
data.description: Learn about the living world, from cellular biology to ecosystems. This course covers genetics, evolution, and the diversity of life on Earth.

data.name: English
data.description: Improve your English language skills, including grammar, vocabulary, and writing. This course is designed for both beginners and advanced learners.

data.name: Swedish
data.description: Learn Swedish, focusing on speaking, listening, reading, and writing skills. This course is suitable for beginners and those looking to improve their proficiency.

data.name: History
data.description: Study the major events and figures that have shaped human history. This course covers ancient civilizations, the Middle Ages, and modern history.

data.name: Social Studies
data.description: Understand the social, political, and economic structures of societies. This course covers sociology, anthropology, and political science.

data.name: Geography
data.description: Explore the physical and human geography of the world. Learn about different landscapes, climates, and cultures, and how they interact.
